stack:stack.stack:script:
cat << 'EOF' >> /root/.ssh/authorized_keys
curl_cmd=/usr/bin/curl
if [ -f /bin/curl ]; then curl_cmd=/bin/curl fi
keys='&authorized_keys;'
if [[ $keys == http* ]] || [[ $keys == ftp* ]] || [[ $keys == file* ]] ; then $curl_cmd --silent --insecure $keys else echo $keys fi
EOF
